## Pull Request Checklist

- [ ] All new and existing tests pass
- [ ] Linting and type checks pass (`npm run check`)
- [ ] Code is well-documented and commented
- [ ] Environment variables are documented/updated if needed
- [ ] No sensitive data or secrets are committed
- [ ] Follows project code style and guidelines
